name: Trick or Treat (RobSmithDev)
overview: The aim of the game is to collect 20 pieces of candy (treats) before you collect 20 tricks (in this cane, spiders, ghosts, bats and skulls!). There is a strategy to winning this game, but I’m not going to share that with you. In this video tutorial I'll guide you through the entire process of creating this game, finishing with a great product. Full Source Code Included!
